alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Callahan County through 945 PM CDT... At 900 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Admiral, or near Putnam, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Putnam, Atwell, Admiral, I-20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line and Scranton. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 313 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for west central Texas.
